about_the_game:
Dive into the Sandrock with style, thanks to our premier partner, Dell Alienware. Together, we bring you an exclusive T-shirt gift—our way of saying thanks for your support. Elevate your gaming experience, celebrate the launch, and wear your dedication. Join us in the adventure! Happy building!

P.S. This DLC content is available only in the Single-player game mode.
detailed_description:
Dive into the Sandrock with style, thanks to our premier partner, Dell Alienware. Together, we bring you an exclusive T-shirt gift—our way of saying thanks for your support. Elevate your gaming experience, celebrate the launch, and wear your dedication. Join us in the adventure! Happy building!

P.S. This DLC content is available only in the Single-player game mode.
legal_notice: ©2023 My Time at Sandrock, a game developed by Pathea Games and published by Pathea Games, Focus Entertainment, PM Studio, and DMM Studio. Their respective logos are trademarks or registered trademarks. All rights reserved.
name: My Time at Sandrock - Alienware Gift

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX760 | AMD Radeon 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommend installing Sandrock on SSD ; Minimum System Requirements might change in the future
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K | AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommend installing Sandrock on SSD ; Recommended System Requirements might change in the future

cadpa.descriptors: 本游戏适用于8周岁以上用户

short_description: Together with Dell Alienware, we bring you an exclusive T-shirt gift—our way of saying thanks for your support.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
